title: Luminara Flicker Pillar Candles at Bed Bath & Beyond
description: The realistic light of the Luminara LED Flicker Candle moves and dances, creating a unique flickering flame effect. Produced using electromagnetics and LED lights, this candle is designed to be used everywhere by everyone. Thanks for watching.

asset.author: Bedbathandbeyond
asset.hookText: http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/store/product/luminara-trade-led-flicker-pillar-candle-in-ivory/3258234? The realistic light of the Luminara LED Flicker ...

transcripts: The Luminara Flame less candles are battery operated and have a beautiful real flame affect. They're made of real wax, not plastic and Luminara's LED system works to create a flame less light that dances and flickers just like a real candle. They come in both 5 inch and 7 inch pillars. Each candle uses two D batteries and will last up to 500 hours. Place them anywhere in your home. Set the built in five hour timer feature and they'll turn on at the same time every day. The candles are also remote ready. The remote is sold separately. They have a mild panellist sent and because they are flame less they're safe around children and pets. These candles are perfect for parties and they look great grouped together. Especially when you mix the different sizes. If you're looking for worry free beautiful candles to illuminate your home just like real candles. These flame less wax candles are the perfect choice. The luminara flame less candles are available online and out of bed bath and beyond. Store near you.
